      • getCurrentPieces

        public int getCurrentPieces()
        Returns the current number of pieces found
        Returns:
        the number of pieces currently found

      • getAddCurrentPieces

        public void getAddCurrentPieces()
        Increments the current pieces if one has been found while searching

        If current pieces is equal to the total number of pieces being looked for the game is over. wonGame boolean is set to true, bonus points are added and gameOver(String s) is called with an empty string

      • endDay

        public void endDay()
        Ends the current day.

        Increments the day, calculates points to add to the score. If that was the last day, game is over. Otherwise, resets the crew members actions and potentially triggers a random event

      • gameOver

        public void gameOver​(java.lang.String death)
        Ends the game, by setting the game over boolean to true, which is checked by MainWindow. Takes cause of death String as input and calculates points, to be used for the game over screen.
        Parameters:
        death - String the cause of death

      • isGameOver

        public boolean isGameOver()
        Returns true if the game is over, false otherwise
        Returns:
        boolean that is true if the game is over, false otherwise

      • getCurrentDay

        public int getCurrentDay()
        Gets the current day
        Returns:
        the current day int

      • setGameLength

        public void setGameLength​(int i)
        Sets the number of days the game will last. Calls setPieces() to set the number of pieces to be found

      • searchPlanet

        public java.lang.String searchPlanet​(java.lang.String name)
        Searches the planet for a piece.

        Takes a crew member name String as input, then generates a random number between 0-25 to corresponding to what item is found 0-8 gets an item, 9 gets nothing, 10-15 gets gold, greater than 15 gets the chance to find either a piece or a random junk item. If there are no pieces left to find on the planet and the number greater than 15, the player is rewarded with an ornate set of mahogany drawers.

        Parameters:
        name - String the crew members name
        Returns:
        The String result of the search

      • randomGold

        public java.lang.Integer randomGold()
        Generates a random amount of gold for the player to receive. 1% chance of million dollar jackpot
        Returns:
        the amount of randomly generated gold

      • travelToNewPlanet

        public boolean travelToNewPlanet​(Person pilot1,
                                 Person pilot2)
        Two pilots fly the ship to a new planet. Checks that both pilots have enough actions and if true generates a new planet. Then rolls for asteroid belt and random event.
        Parameters:
        pilot1 - Person the first pilot
        pilot2 - Person the second pilot
        Returns:
        true if flight was successful, false otherwise

      • pirateAttack

        public void pirateAttack()
        Pirate attack event. Steals item if player has one, else injures all crew and steals gold
